original: Bergström, Sigge Robert, provinsialläkare, Söderåkra, f. 25/7/97 i Edåsa, Skarab. 1., av Robert o. Hilda B. — Stud:ex. i Skövde 16, med. kand. i Upps. 22, med. lic. i_ Sthlm 27. Tf. prov:läk. i Ljusdals distr. 28, undrläk. v. Mössebergs vattenkuranst. samt tf. andre und :läk. v. Karlskrona las. 29, e. läk. v. Sala las. 30-31, andre und:-läk. där 32, förste dito 32-34, und :läk. v. Eksjö sanat. 34-36, därunder tf. överläk. ett år, div. förordn. som provrläk. 37, tf. prov :läk. i Ljungby distr., tf. pTOv:läk. i Lysekils distr. 38, prov :iläk. i Nysätra distr. 40 o. numera i Söderåkra distr.
translated: Bergström, Sigge Robert, provincial physician, Söderåkra, born on July 25, 1897 in Edåsa, Skaraborg County, son of Robert and Hilda B. He completed his high school education in Skövde in 1916, obtained a Bachelor of Medicine degree from Uppsala University in 1922, and a Medical Licentiate degree from Stockholm in 1927. He served as Acting District Physician in Ljusdal in 1928, Assistant Physician at Mösseberg's Water Cure Institute, and Acting Assistant District Physician at Karlskrona Hospital in 1929. He was Resident Physician at Sala Hospital in 1930-31, Assistant District Physician there in 1932 and First Assistant District Physician from 1932-34. He served as Resident Physician at Eksjö Sanatorium from 1934-36, including one year as Acting Chief Physician, and held various positions as District Physician in 1937. He was Acting District Physician in Ljungby district, Acting District Physician in Lysekil district in 1938, District Physician in Nysätra district in 1940, and currently holds the position of District Physician in Söderåkra district. He married in 19xx.
